vote.text: Amendment SA 2856 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 2856 proposed by Senator Frist for Senator Hutchison. (consideration: CR S2756) To provide a substitute amendment.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 2856 proposed by Senator Frist for Senator Hutchison.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 2856 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
